Carica una bella foto, tutti vedranno la: Upload a nice photo, everyone will see your work of art!
Sto ricercando la tua posizione: I am searching for your location
Sembra che questa sia la tua posizione a: This looks like your current position\nMove the cursor on the map to change it
Stiamo caricando la tua segnalazione onl: We are uploading your report online
Solo gli utenti autenticati possono lasc: Only authenticated users can leave a like/dislike
login_desc_string: Login as a guest or with one of your favourite social network!
Stiamo calcolando la tua posizione: We are looking for your location
Accesso non consentito agli utenti ospit: Access not available for guest users
Solo gli utenti che hanno effettuato l'a: Only authenticated users can send reports
search_string: Search what you need simply by moving the map around
report_string: If you find a bin that is not yet on the map, help the community and report it!
permessi_string: To speed up your search we need location permissions, so we can show you what you can find around you right away!
In questa pagina potrai tenere traccia d: In this page you can keep tracks of your reports!
Per poter cominciare pero', devi tornare: You need to be authenticated to use this feature
Vuoi davvero disconnetterti?: Would you like to sign out?
Qualcosa e' andato storto, riprova tra p: Something went wrong, try again soon.
A breve introdurremo la possibilita' di: We are working on implementing a feature to allow report for illegally abandoned waste
